Question: Stern Pinball CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Stern Pinball JAWS

- New pinball game featuring the characters and setting of the iconic movie JAWS
- Available in Pro, Premium, and Limited Edition (LE) models
- Immersive film and audio assets integrated into pinball action
- Custom speech by actor Richard Dreyfuss and the iconic movie theme music by John Williams
- Insider Connected™ system enables players to interact with the game and a global network of players
- Limited to 1,000 games globally, the highly collectible Limited Edition model includes exclusive features and accessories
- Pricing: Pro Edition $6,999, Premium Edition $9,699, Limited Edition $12,999
- Available through authorized Stern Pinball distributors and dealers around the world
Summary_cn:
Stern Pinball JAWS

- 新推出的弹球游戏，以标志性电影《大白鲨》的角色和场景为特色
- 有Pro，Premium和Limited Edition（LE）型号可选择
- 将沉浸式电影和音频资源与弹球游戏融为一体
- 拥有由演员Richard Dreyfuss定制的对话以及由约翰·威廉姆斯创作的标志性电影主题音乐
- Insider Connected™系统可以让玩家与游戏和全球网络中的其他玩家互动
- 限量发行1,000款，高度收藏价值的Limited Edition模型包含独特功能和附件
- 价格：Pro Edition 6,999美元，Premium Edition 9,699美元，Limited Edition 12,999美元
- 可在全球授权的Stern Pinball经销商处购买
